item.title: The impact of GDPR will be remembered in 2018
item.description:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) heavily influenced how we addressed online privacy in 2018. While it primarily protects residents of the European Union, the GDPR’s global reach impacts any company conducting business with EU residents. This broad scope has shifted GDPR from a regional concern to a worldwide one. Several industry leaders have shared their perspectives on GDPR’s significant effects: Source: Sage. Wherrett. Arlene Wherrett, VP and MD of Sage Asia, observed that GDPR was a major catalyst for change in business operations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-impact-of-gdpr-will-be-remembered-in-2018/
